pipeline_summary: 2-3 sentence overview of the complete methodological pipeline
relevance_to_result: Direct explanation of how this pipeline generates the target results
input_artifacts: The raw inputs, assumptions, or starting points of the pipeline
relevance: explain briefly how the pipeline is relevant to generate the results

steps.description: Clear, concise description of what happens in this step

evidences.span: Exact text span from the paper that contains the result in the text

steps.output: What this step produces that feeds into the next step
steps.criticality: Why this step is necessary - what would fail without it
results: associated result id that is the outcome of this step. leave empty if none of the results are the direct output of this step
